name: Ludus Bug
description:
This is an alpha version, and as such -as per the theme-, is not exempt of bugs. (for maximum enjoyment, play nice and pretend you can't leave the yellow circuits)

Left Ctrl to create a save point,

Left Alt (pressed for some time) to die and go back to last save point (or the beginning of the level),

arrows or WASD to move.

Made during the Ludus Academy Game Jam (theme: "bug")

Made with Unity

october 2017
